entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 this morning. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of thundershowers late this evening and after midnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023
